title: mukaambikaam
sahitya:
mUkAmbikAm AshrayE bhAmatIm satIm mUla prakrtim krpAvatIm pAvatIm

anupallavi

 shOkApahAm bhAnukOTi shObhAvahAm shONAbhavi grahAm daitya janAsahAm

caraNam

 shankara dEshaka vanditAm IshvarIm mangala gaurIm nirantarIm shrIkarIm 
shankarIm shAtOdarIm sharvamanOharIm shAkambharIm vana tulasIdala dharIm
